thread.title: Craig David's cover of Justin Bieber song is definitely better than the original
thread.title_full: Craig David's cover of Justin Bieber song is definitely better than the original

author: Sam Haysom
title: Craig David's cover of Justin Bieber song is definitely better than the original
text:
You may not think you needed to see footage of Craig David covering Justin Bieber's "Love Yourself," but that's where you'd be wrong.
SEE ALSO: Internet pretty sure Justin Bieber channeled the old dude from those Six Flags ads
On Sunday, David appeared live at London's O2 arena. At some point during the night, this happened:
When @CraigDavid covers @justinbieber üòç pic.twitter.com/MsqedXEy89
‚Äî The O2 (@TheO2) March 26, 2017
He's pretty damn good, isn't he?
This isn't the first time David's busted out that mashup, either (he's clearly a big fan of the Biebs).
. @justinbieber Love Yourself mash-upüí• Who‚Äôs ready for Ibiza 2017? ‚ú®- https://t.co/6LxO8Fel7q pic.twitter.com/mAGfDeeURt
‚Äî Craig David (@CraigDavid) February 19, 2017
It's high time those two joined forces on stage.
Your move, Bieber.
WATCH: Justin Bieber is not having any of your screaming
